description: Two technology CEOs - Jim Bowes and Robert Belgrave - discuss how technology is changing our lives, joined every month by a special guest from the industry. Supported by D/SRUPTION Magazine.
A podcast about the stories behind interaction design. For UX/UI  designers, and the design curious. Hosted by Adobe principle designer Khoi Vinh. Brought to you by Adobe and Gimlet Creative.
No chit-chat, just focused in-depth discussions about design topics that matter. Jonathan Shariat and Chris Liu are your hosts and bring to the table passion and years of experience.

authors: Wes Bos & Scott Tolinski - Full Stack Javascript and Web Developers
description: Wes Boss and Scott Tolinski are tow full stack web developers who like to breakdown complex topics and make them easy to understand.

Conversations with the leaders, hackers and innovators of software development. Hosts Adam Stacoviak and Jerod Santo face their imposter syndrome so you don't have to . Expect in-depth interviews with...
